website_summaries.verdict: This parachute is a huge 30 feet in diameter for large groups to enjoy.
pros: Parachute has 24 handles with lots of places for kids to hold
Works well with kids of multiple ages playing together
cons: This parachute is so large that it's best for gymnasiums

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the toddler/preschool crowd!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as an activity for my kids' birthday party (they'll be turning 4 and 1). Though we haven't had the party yet this has still been a fun home activity. Great for inside and outside play! Great quality. I suspect it will last until my kids have out grown it if not longer! Update: It was a hit at the birthday party which had children ranging in age from 6 months to 4.5 years. And held up to all the use at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Throwback to Childhood Gym Class (Big enough for Adults!)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a party (for adults) and was nervous it would not be big enough, however upon opening this parachute is huge and can work with as little as 6 adults (holding two handles) or even more if you put one person per handle. We were able to re-live our childhood gym class days and had a blast doing so! the parachute seems to be very durable, however I have only used it twice. definitely would suggest buying if you are looking for a throwback or want to entertain children! it really is a great arm workout also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our homeschool family
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our homeschool family. It is not as big as a school or library parachute. It can comfortable be used by 4 people. It came with a carrying bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: We use it for about 5 minutes once a week. Tied bells to the center underneath for Christmas. Has held up better than expected so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great parachute (24 foot) it is even a little large for my classroom. It's really lightweight and easy to transfer from place to place. There are enough handles for a class of 25 and large enough for 25 10 year olds to fit under. I would recommend to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Zo_Ami

customer_reviews.title: Super fun activity for children and/or adults
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old nephew & 7 year old niece loved it! I got them the 12' 'chute so they could use it indoors during the winter months. I'm thinking of getting a 20' or 30' to break out during special occasions when the weather warms! The vibrant colors evoke a happiness, which make cloudy days seem brighter :) I had a friend who used to bring her 30' to music festivals & parties, and it was always a huge hit 👍
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: and it was PERFECT for 2 classes to play simultaneously
customer_reviews.text: I bought this parachute for Vacation Bible School. It has 20 handles, and it was PERFECT for 2 classes to play simultaneously. These classes consisted of 12 to 15 persons per class. It is very durable. It was walked on at times, but there are no tears on it. They loved it! I highly recommend this parachute.
customer_reviews.author: Janie S.

customer_reviews.title: Well Done
customer_reviews.text: I used this parachute with my adapted physical education class and the kids loved it. They gave it a good workout pulling on the handles and everything held together well. Also, there colors are very bright, which is a big plus when learning colors. I have only used it three times bu so far so good. I wish the bags that hold the parachute was larger because it is a pain to stuff it in to the small bag supplied. It is the only reason I did not give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Flom

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, compact, so much fun! Many possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: So many possibilities with this parachute. So colorful and fun that other kids will also be intrigued enough to join in the fun. It's a great energy burner when the weather is nice, but we can use it indoors for too though space is limited. The storage pouch is nice. We recently brought this on vacation because it is such a hit with our kid and it is compact enough bring along. Such a great value to inspire physical activity.
customer_reviews.author: KJB Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful toy for children of most all ages! Kids can use their imagination with this bright, colorful and pleasing parachute. The handles provide a secure hold so that the kids may work together to billow the chute satisfyingly. It is both a toy which promotes activity and quiet play. The kids use it draped over furniture to make a hideout. Very fun and versatile toy and I recommend it wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Bringing school fun home
customer_reviews.text: "Santa" gave this parachute this year. He was hunting for non-traditional things that are fun and encourage imaginative play. My kids love playing with the parachute at school. Now they can have fun at home. Our parachute has been a spaceship, tent, circus prop, restaurant, and a gameboard...not to mention an awesome hide and seek spot. I bought this one for it's quality and ability to last a long time. I'm confident it will!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: my grandchildren had lots of fun with it the day they opened presents
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the middle was not open; there is a piece of mesh sewn over it. The goal of one of the games I found for parachutes was to get a ball through the hole in the middle. That being said, my grandchildren had lots of fun with it the day they opened presents. The parachute was well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Vokac

customer_reviews.title: The actual product looks better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: The Champion Sports Parachute comes with its own carrying bag. The color of the bag matches the blue section in the parachute exactly. The colors are very vibrant, and I'm sure will attract the attention of the infants and toddlers I will be working with. The bag and the parachute look to be very durable, so I'm sure it will last me for a long time. I would recommend this product, and am very glad I chose the Champion Sports Parachute.
customer_reviews.author: JenGrin

customer_reviews.title: Small, sturdy parachute
customer_reviews.text: I got this parachute for a preschool music class I run out of my home. The kids are pretty rough with it, but it's holding up really well. It is a great material with the right weight and flexibility. I like the mesh center patch so air can flow through but our toys don't fall through. It is the perfect size for my living room. Works well for the kids to sit on too...I have everyone pick a different color.
customer_reviews.author: ailicoyote

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At my previous job, we had a 20 - foot parachute made by the same company. It was such great quality and stood up to lots of abuse, that when I needed to purchase one of my own, I came back to the same company. The 24-ft. diameter parachute is huge! Perfect for group games with lots of children. If you have smaller groups, you'll want to go with a smaller parachute.
customer_reviews.author: corbyzgirl

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with my 2 1/2 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old son loves this. It is great for playing inside we can involve his 10 month old brother too. (He just sits underneath it and squeals.) If you are looking for a really big parachute to use in a gymnasium or with a large group then the size of this would probably disappoint you, but it is perfect for playing with a small group of 2-5 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our 2 year old because I remember how much fun these were in grade school gym and also because our 2 year old is autistic and this would be perfect for his therapy and for him and his 4 year old sister to play with. I love that it comes with it's own carrying case. Easy for storage so it doesn't get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great price after shopping around
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the neighborhood block party. Great price after shopping around. It's been two and a half years and it's still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Nardiello

customer_reviews.title: The kids love playing with the parachute and seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: We have a big family and purchased this as a gift for my youngest. The kids love playing with the parachute and seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger the better...daycare approved
customer_reviews.text: Like I remember as akid! Wish we went bigger cause its hard to trap air when it's that small. We only had 5 old enough kids so that's why we chose 12 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mtcrew

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very durable. It's traveled to the park, beach, and helped with many OT sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Hlpur

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Fun bright colors! Arrived on time. But, I will not recommend to a friend due to the prop 65 warning associated with this product. Unfortunately, that information is given after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Grbell

customer_reviews.title: Great paracute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with the kids at my church's VBS. The preschools and the big kids all had a great time using it! Loved the handles for making holding on a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: ... fabric but this does the job and my kids love to play with this
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the soft silk fabric but this does the job and my kids love to play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a small bag and it is durable, but also can be compact down to store.
customer_reviews.author: kt021

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for the trampoline. I have seen the wind blow it and it stays secure. Kids love having the shade on really sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: ramona

customer_reviews.title: here we go round the parachute
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE this item. My Sunday School class goes nuts when I drag this out. My grandchildren never want to quit playing once this is bought out. Nice, strong, durable item and stands up to abuse it gets. Will buy another when this one goes. The seller was AWESOME also. Fast Shipping, good communication, and EXCELLENT price.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Koontz

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beach and play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly because I use it as a mat for the beach it folds nicely and is perfect for the beach multi-purpose as fun for little ones and a barrier for towels! made well, bright colors, sturdy stitches, etc will recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: chinhappy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shade for my 15' Skywalker trampoline
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shade for my 15' Skywalker trampoline! My trampoline has 6 poles holding up the safety netting, so this parachute with 12 handles works great... I used a bungee cord on every other handle to each of the poles to suspend it. If I were ordering it again I might get the 20' one and have it drape over the sides a bit, just because I have trees that drop all kinds of stuff on the trampoline and since this isn't as big in diameter as the trampoline that stuff still gets on to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is durable, and the colors are vibrant. The kids love playing with it. A good buy! We played with it at a first birthday party, and several times since. It came with a storage bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: The twelve handles are great. The parachute seems well made and held up ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this parachute during VBS in the pre-school department. The twelve handles are great. The parachute seems well made and held up really well under very energetic use. It is just the right size for indoor use with 6-14 preschoolers. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 15ft trampoline
customer_reviews.text: We used it as a top for the trampoline. Perfect size for a 15ft trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: UWi

customer_reviews.title: So many ways to have fun
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is quite nice. It is very colorful as pictured and the quality is great. It arrived promptly. The family has had much fun with it. There are so many ways you can use this and seems to entertain all ages. I am very happy we have it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best $25 I have spent in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Well made - my 3 year old son squealed when he opened the box. Best $25 I have spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dugas

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality material . Does not work at all. The material is like a plastic table cover. Not sure how this got 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good parachute...perfect size...used for preschooler and kindergarten classes but handles are already coming loose a bit??
customer_reviews.author: ty2nat

customer_reviews.title: Home gym time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved Gymboree, and this brings some of the fun to home. Be aware that with the limited diameter, the parachute does not loft or capture air for very long. She loves peeking through the netting while we pretend to not be able to see her
customer_reviews.author: BigMontana

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great parachute. It's high quality and large enough to blow your baby's mind! I got this for my son's first birthday party and everyone loved it - the babies as well as the older cousins (all ages up to 9). Who doesn't love a parachute?! I like that it comes with its own carrying bag as well. And it's not too bulky, so you could throw it in the bottom of your stroller to take to the park on a whim.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love our parachute! Quality is amazing. We have had ours for a few years and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not the ones is gym class
customer_reviews.text: This is a stiffer fabric than the ones we used to have in gym time growing up. I would pay the few extra bucks to get the higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great but huge
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest size, and it is way too big. You need at least a dozen adults to make it go. Otherwise, it is pretty dang fun, but I wish I had a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Dingfelder

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item. Birthday gift for a 7-year-old and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item. Birthday gift for a 7-year-old and it was a huge hit! Would highly recommend for any kids.
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small groups
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family child care and we use it with 2 adults and 8 children. Great size for small groups.
customer_reviews.author: K___

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The parachute seems small for 6ft. It is still fun to play and my nephew has fun. The parachute comes in its own bag to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Marella4

customer_reviews.title: Great... Just wish I got a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Is holding up great. Love all the handles. So much fun for everyone and there are so many things you can do. I just wish I had gotten a bigger size. The price was great though and we have gotten our money's worth. I'm very satisfied with this product even considering it's size.
customer_reviews.author: kso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids old and young love this - it's a hit in any group
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: i've used this twice so far, it seems nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item for my son, 16 mo old.
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old LOVES this... it's smaller than the ones you see at some of the play places, but it's great for a playroom or out on the lawn. He giggles and runs under it, we hide under it, etc. It's been a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Do-It-Yourself Danielle

customer_reviews.title: My Stepfather's Nursing Home Loves This
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as it was presented on line, and is a perfect work out tool for all those who are strong enough to exercise in the nursing home. My stepfather said he and all who are using this are very happy. Thank you! Mary
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stanley

customer_reviews.title: 12 Ft Parachute - Great for Parties
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a birthday party - and I wish I bought it years ago. The kids LOVED it. The children, ages 6-8, played the cat and mouse game. All the kids hold the handles and shake the parachute - one child crawls under the parachute and another child crawls on top of the parachute. The "cat" on top tries to tag the mouse. The kids loved it - and best of all the parachute withstood all the abuse. Very well made and worth every penny! Highly recommend - great party activity.
customer_reviews.author: CDoh

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Its not too big or too small. We use it as a parachute, a swing, we drag my son with it, and play hide and go seek under it. I even take it on playdates so the kids can jump around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Took it to my nephews 1st Birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took it to my nephews 1st Birthday party and it was a hit! 12 foot was the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: MFK2315

customer_reviews.title: I've used items like this before at a previous job and was impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters birthday party. I've used items like this before at a previous job and was impressed with the quality of this parachute! The price is reasonable and the kids had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Blum

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old niece loves playing with a parachute at mommy and me classes that I decided to buy her this parachute for her birthday. It is perfect for a really small group. The maximum should be three people with one of those people under the parachute. We had my niece go underneath and she loved it just as much as the huge parachute from her class.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Helmy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this! And it is holding up to them ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this! And it is holding up to them as well. It has been awesome for our little backyard get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but the material isn't great but colors are nice handles seem solid so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a class I teach and the kids love it. It's the perfect size for 8 kids or less. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof5

customer_reviews.title: My 5 and 2 years old sons love it. We had a camping week with their ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 2 years old sons love it. We had a camping week with their cousins and they had a great time playing with it. It could be perfect if it comes with more accessories like small balls to play with. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Children's Librarian and use this during storytime. It's the perfect size and the kids have so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best mission Trip purchase yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to take to a village in Honduras. The kids LOVED it. They played with it every day (about 40 kids at once) . In fact it was such a hit, we decided to leave it with them. I was very pleased with how durable it was. Im sure it will last them a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Toni kelecheck

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was an Easter present for my kids. Great for large families.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mom

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys playing with the parachute. It is well made and easy to fold and unfold. It stores well in its protective pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Garden girl

customer_reviews.title: Parachute Mania in Uganda!
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute hit with our children in Uganda that we support through Mission Mbale (visit us on FB). The only problem was we needed one with about 100 handles! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Warren L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be well made, for its use. My grand son loves it. It is something you can use to play with your grandchildren in a very physical way. Great exercise for all of you.
customer_reviews.author: RHL

customer_reviews.title: It is holding up nicely, no rips or tears
customer_reviews.text: We have used this several of times already with groups of children and youth. It is holding up nicely, no rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This parachute was very well made. The material was strong and we had 12 children pulling and shaking on it for a birthday party. It was definitely put to the test and it is still in one piece! A great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Law

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It may not be big, but it's a perfect size for two and three year olds. We used it at my son's third birthday party and all the kids loved it. We have since given it to his teacher and she uses it in her toddler class.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this parachute! It's a great size for toddlers to play with, the children enjoy it a lot! Great activity!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Fun at-home parachute, has held up so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this parachute so far!!! I wanted one for a birthday party, but didn't want to pay a tom for a fancy one. This is a great home parachute (as opposed to an industrial school one). It's really quite thin and flimsy, and I was nervous these 8 little kids were going to rip it to shreds with the aggressiveness they were playing with it. But if held up and did fine. The handles stayed on, and it was a lot of fun to play with. It packs up in the included bag, and is pretty compact. I'm looking forward to more fun times with it!!
customer_reviews.author: ZMomUtah

customer_reviews.title: Tons of outdoor fun.
customer_reviews.text: Creative outdoor fun for our kids and the neighborhood children. Amazing what you can find to do with a parachute! Nice quality and just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY T

customer_reviews.title: Great for a family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons that have four boys. Great fun in the house and out in the yard. Works on playing together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have many fond memories as a kid using a prachute in gym class. I bought this for my 3 year old son for Christmas and we brought it out at my 8 year old's birthday party with 8 kids. It was so much fun! The handles are sturdy and the product was exactly as described. Well worth the money. Can't wait to use it outside when it's warmer!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: larger would be better
customer_reviews.text: flimsy. isn't really big enough to play lift the parachute. i bought this for my 1 year old but it is too small to be much fun.
customer_reviews.author: BondFam

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. Worth the extra money over some of the cheaper options. Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages! We loved it and still have it two years latter and it is in perfect shape. FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday party and everyone had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i though it would be softer and i would have ordered a larger size
customer_reviews.author: bjohns

customer_reviews.title: Fun item. As opposed to the 12' model
customer_reviews.text: Fun item. As opposed to the 12' model, this is small enough to be used indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Muniac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of colors. It matched my daughters dress perfectly !
customer_reviews.author: Darelle Ford

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my bf and he loved it, his class is going to get alot of use out of this!
customer_reviews.author: CharD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size and price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and price! I bought this for a toddler music class activity, but it has become my son's favorite thing! It is big enough for all 7the toddlers to share in class, but my son and I can handle it well too. I am happy with the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift so do not know about its quality but it did arrive sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: beerosy

customer_reviews.title: just as i remember
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, colorful, and comes in its own carrying case. The only issue I have is that 12' is a little small for full grown men to sit under, so if you're buying for adult use I would get a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo loves this parachute! The colors are so bright!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N.

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be of much use
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to toss things up to the size of hamsters, perhaps, but completely useless for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kartchner

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice Item. I will use it a lot in camps.
customer_reviews.author: Jose H. Gomez J

customer_reviews.title: Still in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: Got it a year ago. Kids still play with it.. Still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to occupy my kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an easy and fun way to occupy my kids (all of whom are very young), and they love it. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy parachute!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these, one for each of our children's families. Both families love it. It can be used for so many purposes- to shake, put balls on, go under, ride on, etc. It can hold several children at a time while their grandpa pulls them around the house! We have also used it to swing each child individually. It is the perfect size for a family, and has enough handles for several children and adults. We are both retired physical therapists, and have used the 12 foot parachute for groups of children. But the 6 foot one is great for our grandkids! We all have fun. It is very colorful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great toy that keeps kids entertained. Works great for daycares.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I already used it with a group of 25 adults and we had lost of fun and it's very resistant!
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yo absolutely loves this! He uses it to play hide and seek, fort, he puts balls in it and makes us throw them up. The ways to use this are endless. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: It's made very well! I got it for my son's birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great to use with kids
customer_reviews.text: Big parachute that is very good to use to play games with kids. Durable as well and easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Robold

customer_reviews.title: Always fun
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong, buying a parachute -- it's always fun. This is a perfect size for indoor play. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LiB

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have brought this to several group picnics and the kids always have fun with it. It is kind of small but 5 or 6 kids under six years have a good time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: no regrets great buy
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this parachute...excited about playing with it daily...vibrant colors and small handles make lit easy too use for little people.
customer_reviews.author: I -Pod Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this for our two children, who collectively weight roughly 75 pounds. We can swing both of the kids in this, and it didn't rip! If you have creative children, they will find many uses for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: The perfect parachute! Classic, vibrant colors and made of sturdy material. This parachute is the perfect size for my storytime classes (8-15 children +adults on any given day). We originally had two mini-parachutes, but you can’t do much with those. With this we can play popcorn and the kids can all fit under it for the finale. I’m so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hanchett

customer_reviews.title: Pure magic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my Children's Choir and it has quickly become the absolute highlight of each class. There is something so magical about when everyone brings it down behind their backs, making a big mushroom overhead. The kids faces just light up! Seriously...endless fun. And I've been able to make up simple music and rhythm games using the parachute, too, which makes it relevant to what I'm teaching. This this is HUGE, by the way. I typically have about 20 kids in my class and there is a handle for each one of them.
customer_reviews.author: JaxLex

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Multi-Colored Parachute
feature_bullets: Reinforced mesh center allows ample air flow and prevents balls from rolling through
